text: "Diamonds" is a song by Barbadian singer Rihanna from her seventh album, Unapologetic. It was the first song off of the album. It was Rihanna's twelfth number one single on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. Several rappers have rapped or made a remix to the song. They include Kanye West, Flo Rida and Eve. ==Tracklist== ;CD single (RCA) (Sony Music) # "Diamonds" (4:07) # "Diamonds" (Live) (3:51) ==Charts== === Weekly charts === Chart (2012–2014) Peak position scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Belgium (Ultratop Flanders Urban) 1 scope="row" Brazil (Billboard Brasil Hot 100) 1 Brazil Hot Pop Songs 1 Bulgaria (Airplay Top 5) 1 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Europe (Billboard Euro Digital Songs) 1 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Greece (IFPI) 1 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Italy (FIMI) 3 Japan (Billboard Japan Hot 100) 24 Luxembourg (Billboard) 1 Mexico (Billboard) 2 Mexico (Monitor Latino) 6 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Portugal (AFP) 1 Romania (Airplay 100) Note: User may scroll down the 'Podcasturi' menu to play or download the respective podcast. 1 scope="row" Russia (Billboard Hot 50 Airplay) 1 scope="row" Slovakia (IFPI) 1 Slovenia (SloTop50) 30 South Korea International Singles (Gaon Chart) 3 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Ukraine (FDR Charts) 3 scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" Venezuela (Record Report) 3 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2012) Position Australia (ARIA) 32 Australia Urban (ARIA) 8 Austria (Ö3 Austria Top 40) 19 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) 31 Belgium (Ultratop Flanders Urban) 6 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Wallonia) 26 Canadian Hot 100 (Billboard) 69 Denmark (Tracklisten) 9 Finland (Suomen virallinen lista)"Myydyimmät singlet vuonna 2012" (in Finnish).
